TopicTitle: No Science Awarded When Finishing Mission

Articles.Content:
Started a new career save, launched my first vehicle, finished it by recovering the vessel, and was awarded money, reputation, but no science. I was using Kerbal Construction Time, and fearing that could be the issue, removed it, and started a new game. Yet the issue still persists. Anyone have any ideas as to what it might be?

GameData folder

Output Log

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-fDQm-LW0S6ZXVXSEZNSHprU1E/view?usp=sharing

Did you do any science? Were the science parts still attached to the ship when you recovered? Did you reset, keep data, or transmit after each experiment?
